bill_title: repeal certain restrictions on school district transfers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal certain restrictions on school district transfers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-16-26.2 be repealed. 13-16-26.2. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 13-16-26, no school district may transfer any funds, exclusive of federal funds, from the general fund to the capital outlay fund, bond redemption fund or the capital projects fund. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
